    Author:
    Christine Solnon + H4103

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RegularGraph(int n, int d, int min, int max)
      Creates a graph such that each vertex is connected to the next d vertices (modulo n) and such that the cost of each arc is a randomly chosen integer ranging between min and max

      Constructeur qui crée le graphe necessaire pour le traitement par Choco

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegularGraph

        public RegularGraph(Noeud entrepot,
                    java.util.Vector<PlageHoraire> plagesHoraires,
                    Plan plan)
        Constructeur qui crée le graphe necessaire pour le traitement par Choco
        Parameters:
        entrepot - Le noeud ou se situe l'entrepot
        plagesHoraires - L'ensemble des plages horaires (qui contiennent les livraisons) de la demande de livraison en cours
        plan - Le plan chargé

      • RegularGraph

        public RegularGraph(int n,
                    int d,
                    int min,
                    int max)
        Creates a graph such that each vertex is connected to the next d vertices (modulo n) and such that the cost of each arc is a randomly chosen integer ranging between min and max
        Parameters:
        n - a number of vertices such that n > 0
        d - a degree such that 0 < d < n
        min - a minimal arc cost such that 0 < min
        max - a maximal arc cost such that min < max
